dataTemplate.name: XXPASCNV
dataTemplate.description: OD PB SC New Vendor Tracking Log Report

dataQuery.sqlStatement: select od_sc_vendor_number, od_sc_vendor_name, od_sc_vend_type, od_sc_vendor_status, od_sc_activation_date, OD_SC_INACTIVE_DATE, OD_SC_REACTIVATE_DATE, od_sc_doc_val_date, od_sc_fqa_aprvl_d, od_sc_audit_agent, od_sc_factory_number, od_sc_factory_name, od_sc_europe_rgn, od_sc_mexico_region, od_sc_asia_region, od_sc_department, od_sc_merchant, od_sc_audit_required, od_sc_audit_waiver audit_not_reqd, od_sc_audtwaiv_apr_d audit_not_apr_date, OD_SC_VEND_REGION, od_sc_vend_comments, od_sc_potrm_apr_d, od_sc_preaudt_result PreAudit_result, od_sc_zt_status PreAudit_CAP, od_sc_fzt_aprvl_d PreAudit_FApr_date, OD_SC_STRAUDT_REQ_D, OD_SC_PAYMENT_RETAINER, OD_SC_VENDPAY_RCVD_D, OD_SC_STRAUDT_SCHD_D, OD_SC_STR_AUDIT_RESULT, od_sc_cap_recd_d cap_received, od_sc_straudt_cap_status cap_status, od_sc_cap_final_approver cap_fapprover, od_sc_srtaudt_us_apr_d cap_fapr_date, od_sc_vend_initiate req_vend_no, od_sc_initstr_notify audit_initiate, od_sc_document_comments doc_comments, od_sc_pending_status_change pending_status_change from Q_OD_PB_SC_VENDOR_MASTER_V where od_sc_vendor_status IS NULL AND NVL(od_sc_audit_agent,'X')=NVL(:p_agent,NVL(od_sc_audit_agent,'X')) AND NVL(od_sc_merchant,'X')=NVL(:p_merchant,NVL(od_sc_merchant,'X')) AND NVL(od_sc_product,'X')=NVL(:p_prod_type,NVL(od_sc_product,'X')) ORDER BY 1,2
